person.persName: Benjamin Egelston (Covington, Kentucky, justice of the peace)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, justice of the peace. New York native. Married to Margaret Egelston. Father of Addison Egelston and Benjamin Egelston, Jr. Justice of the peace in the 2nd District of Covington from 1855 to 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 5, p. 251; "Kenton.," The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), May 9, 1855, p. 1; KYR-0001-007-0357.
